subject: Re: [junit] re:using weblogic with junit
msgSnippet: Hi All, I m newer to Junit.  I would like automate one web page testing where I m giving manual feed. How to automate using Junit. please provide some idea
messageBody:
Hi All,
I'm newer to Junit. I would like automate one web page testing where I'm
giving manual feed. How to automate using Junit. please provide some idea
regarding this.
Thanks in advance
Dhana
On 11/29/06, Joakim Ohlrogge <joakim.ohlrogge@...> wrote:
>
> What we do when we unit test is that we implement our code in pojos
> configured with spring and run them outside of weblogic. We only deploy
> code
> in weblogic to run our acceptance test suite. If this sounds interesting I
> can explain more.
>
> /J
>
> On 11/29/06, deveshkhattar <deveshkhattar@...<deveshkhattar%40yahoo.co.in>>
> wrote:
> >
> > Hi
> > I need some help. I need to deploy my weblogic server each time i test
> > my junits.As a result, a lot of time gets wasted. I would appreciate
> > some help.
> >
> > thanks
> > Devesh Khattar
> >
> >
> >
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
>



--
Kind Regards
Dhanapalan.C

" If there is a way, I will find one, If there is none,I will make one....
!!! "
